transcript: the way that the biggest beliefs have been broken for me have been one of two ways reality proves me wrong or someone tells me a story and gives me evidence from their lives I remember we went to a mastermind we were just starting out I was not making a ton of money A guy got up there he gave his little Spiel and he's like yeah you know we're making three or four hundred thousand dollars a month I don't really know what I'm doing the guy did not seem smart my actual first thought was if he can do it I can do it through evidence he reshaped my reality it was one of the most momentous thing I either have reality prove you wrong or someone else is that reality for you where they tell their story about I used to think this thing and then I will share my story so you don't have to have the scar
